item.title: 阿布扎比将整合财富基金ADQ与L’imad资产
item.description: 阿布扎比政府宣布将整合利马德控股公司与主权财富基金ADQ的资产及投资，旨在打造其所谓的主权投资巨头。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s government said it will consolidate the assets and investments of L’imad Holding Co. and wealth fund ADQ, in a bid to create what it called a sovereign investment powerhouse.】

item.title: 日本外籍劳工记录凸显移民问题 投票前夕引发关注
item.description: 日本外国劳工人数去年创下新高，这一数据很可能成为选举辩论的焦点——围绕对移民劳工的依赖问题，以及日益增长的极右翼政党"第三党"支持者群体中持续发酵的焦虑情绪。【原文：Japan’s population of foreign workers hit a fresh record last year, figures that will likely feed into the election debate on the reliance on immigrant workers and simmering angst among the rising number of voters supporting the far-right Sanseito party.】

item.title: 瑞恩·雷诺兹持股的雷克瑟姆队深陷外汇经纪商Argentex倒闭风波
item.description: 由好莱坞明星瑞恩·雷诺兹和罗伯·麦克埃尔亨尼掌控、并获得阿波罗全球管理公司支持的威尔士足球俱乐部雷克瑟姆AFC，已卷入英国货币经纪商Argentex集团的破产风波。【原文：Wrexham AFC, the Welsh soccer club controlled by Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney and backed by Apollo Global Management Inc., has been caught up in the collapse of UK currency brokerage Argentex Group Plc.】

item.title: 连伦敦最乐观的经纪人也不看好豪宅市场前景
item.description: 伦敦顶级房产经纪人多年来一直高估该市最昂贵社区的房价涨幅，如今终于认清现实。【原文：London’s top property brokers, who have overestimated house price growth in the city’s priciest neighborhoods for years, have finally thrown in the towel.】

item.title: 印尼在MSCI警告后将加速市场改革
item.description: 在经历一周剧烈市场波动后，印尼正着手加速推进今年证券交易所的股份化进程，旨在拓宽融资渠道并吸引新投资者。【原文：Indonesia is moving to fast-track the demutualization of its stock exchange this year in a bid to broaden access to capital and draw new investors after a week of sharp market volatility.】

item.title: 据称Indo-MIM计划在印度IPO中筹集高达7亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，精密零部件制造商Indo-MIM有限公司正筹备在印度进行首次公开募股，计划以较低估值筹集高达7亿美元资金。【原文：Precision components maker Indo-MIM Ltd. is preparing to launch its initial public offering in India seeking to raise as much as $700 million at a reduced valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据称黑石正考虑出售Interplex旗下价值10亿美元的ICT业务部门
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团正考虑出售Interplex的信息与通信技术部门，多家私募股权公司和行业参与者对此表示出兴趣。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering selling Interplex’s information and communications technology unit amid interest from other private equity firms and industry players, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国反对党在激烈选战中扩大领先优势
item.description: 距离大选仅剩九天之际，人民党对泰国执政党泰爱泰党的领先优势进一步扩大，此次选举很可能再次导致议会分裂。【原文：People’s Party has extended its lead over Thailand’s ruling Bhumjaithai Party with just nine days to go before an election that’s likely to produce another divided parliament.】

item.title: 日本两年期国债拍卖需求强劲，收益率具吸引力
item.description: 日本两年期国债拍卖需求强劲，尽管市场普遍预期日本央行将收紧政策，但收益率上升支撑了投资者需求。【原文：Japan’s two-year government bond auction drew solid demand, as elevated yields supported investor appetite despite rising expectations that the Bank of Japan will tighten policy.】

item.title: Kpler数据显示中国液化天然气进口量连续第三个月增长
item.description: 中国液化天然气进口量在连续两个月攀升后，预计1月份将再度增长，这表明买家可能通过长期合同增加了采购量。【原文：China’s liquefied natural gas imports are set to rise again in January, after climbing over the previous two months, indicating buyers may have taken more cargoes via long-term contracts.】

item.title: 铜价下跌，中国市场狂热消退，动荡一周收官
item.description: 铜价在异常波动的一周结束时从历史高位回落，交易因伦敦金属交易所系统故障受阻，同时中国投资者撤资及美元走强也对市场构成压力。【原文：Copper sank from a record at the end of an extraordinarily volatile week, with trading marred by an glitch on the London Metal Exchange, as Chinese investors pulled back and the US dollar rose.】

item.title: 股市暴跌后，对普拉博沃印尼愿景的担忧浮现
item.description: 自1998年亚洲金融危机以来，印尼股市遭遇最大规模抛售之一，加剧了投资者对总统普拉博沃·苏比安托将东南亚最大经济体带向何方的担忧。【原文：One of the biggest selloffs in Indonesia since the Asian Financial Crisis in 1998 is deepening worries among investors about where President Prabowo Subianto is taking Southeast Asia’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 马来西亚央行拒绝使用林吉特支持出口
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，强劲的经济增长和持续的改革将为林吉特提供支撑，并排除了利用该货币支持出口的可能性，称出口取决于全球需求。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said strong growth and ongoing reforms would provide support for the ringgit, ruling out using the currency to support exports, which it said are determined by global demand.】

item.title: 对冲基金投资者重燃对中国投资热情，而美国市场吸引力减弱
item.description: 法国巴黎银行年度调查显示，今年计划增持中国主题对冲基金的全球投资者数量持续增长，与三年前投资者争相撤资的局面形成鲜明对比。【原文：A growing number of global investors plan to add money to China-focused hedge funds this year, a stark reversal from the stampede for the exit only three years ago, according to an annual survey by BNP Paribas SA.】

item.title: 澳元看涨者涌入期权市场，加息预期升温
item.description: 外汇交易员正加码押注澳元看涨期权，因市场日益确信澳大利亚储备银行将于周二加息。【原文：Currency traders are ramping up bullish Australian dollar bets in the options market as conviction grows for the Reserve Bank of Australia to raise interest rates on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度国防股因欧盟贸易协定再度成为焦点
item.description: 一只衡量国防类股的Nifty指数本周上涨逾8%。【原文：A Nifty gauge of defense stocks is up over 8% this week.】

item.title: 比特币跌至两个月低点，美国基金抛售规模达数十亿美元
item.description: 比特币在亚洲早盘交易中跌至两个月新低，因市场情绪持续恶化，投资者纷纷从该加密货币的交易所交易基金中撤资。【原文：Bitcoin slumped to fresh two-month lows in early Asia trade as sentiment continues to sour around the largest cryptocurrency and investors pull money out of exchange-traded funds for the token.】

item.title: 日本调整外汇策略，短期内日元汇率取得成效
item.description: 日本成功为日元争取到喘息空间，迄今未见大规模干预迹象，这表明其新策略——即高度依赖美国恐慌因素——在短期内取得了成效。【原文：Japan has managed to secure breathing space for the yen with no evidence so far of any large-scale intervention, an indication of short-term success for modified tactics that lean heavily on the US fear factor.】

item.title: 印尼证券交易所首席执行官在股市暴跌后辞职
item.description: 印尼证券交易所首席执行官伊曼·拉赫曼表示，在MSCI公司警告可能下调评级引发市场连续两日暴跌后，他将辞去职务。【原文：Iman Rachman, chief executive officer of the Indonesia Stock Exchange, said he will step down following a two-day market rout sparked by MSCI Inc.’s warning of a possible downgrade.】

item.title: 部分人士认为亚洲ETF黄金流入创纪录是警示信号
item.description: 亚洲投资者正以创纪录的规模涌入黄金交易所交易基金，这使得一些人质疑金价的上涨是否即将见顶。【原文：Asian investors are pouring record amounts into gold exchange-traded funds, leading some to question whether the rally in bullion is getting close to topping out.】

item.title: 美元与美债收益率上涨，因特朗普将提名沃什出任美联储主席
item.description: 在有消息称美国总统特朗普正准备提名凯文·沃什担任下一任美联储主席后，美元与国债收益率同步走高。【原文：The dollar advanced along with Treasury yields after US President Donald Trump was said to be preparing to nominate Kevin Warsh to be the next Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: 特朗普警告英国：习近平与斯塔默会晤后，中国采取"危险"举措
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普警告英国和加拿大不要与中国达成新的商业协议。此前两国领导人本月访问北京，试图深化与世界第二大经济体的关系。【原文：President Donald Trump warned the UK and Canada against striking fresh business deals with China, after their leaders visited Beijing this month in an effort to deepen ties with the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁迫使韩国重启美韩贸易谈判
item.description: 韩国产业部长在华盛顿与美国商务部长会晤，但未能在平息新一轮贸易摩擦方面取得进展。双方同意周五重启谈判，首尔方面正试图化解特朗普总统近期提高关税的威胁。【原文：South Korea’s industry minister met with the US commerce chief in Washington but failed to make progress in quelling fresh trade friction, with the two sides agreeing to resume talks Friday as Seoul seeks to head off President Donald Trump’s recent threat to raise tariffs.】

item.title: 黑石洽购股份，新世界股债双涨
item.description: 新世界发展公司股价和债券价格飙升，此前知情人士透露，黑石集团正就成为这家香港开发商的最大单一股东进行深入谈判。【原文：New World Development Co.’s shares and bonds surged after people familiar with the matter said Blackstone Inc. is in advanced talks to become the single largest shareholder of the Hong Kong developer.】

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所据称推迟市场开放
item.description: 据彭博社获得的一份致经纪商的通知显示，伦敦金属交易所因技术问题推迟了周五的交易启动时间。【原文：The London Metal Exchange has delayed the start of trading on Friday due to technical issues, according to a notice to brokers seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 日本任天堂和索尼面临存储器价格压力
item.description: 任天堂公司和索尼集团公司下周公布财报时，将面临市场对其游戏主机盈利能力受到人工智能需求推动的内存芯片价格飙升影响的审视。【原文：Nintendo Co. and Sony Group Corp. will face scrutiny over how soaring memory chip prices driven by AI demand have affected their game console profitability when they report earnings next week.】

item.title: 苹果在中国市场强势反弹，创下四年来的最佳季度销售业绩
item.description: 苹果公司在中国市场迎来假期期间的强劲反弹，新款iPhone 17的需求推动其在该地区创下自2021年底以来的首个250亿美元季度业绩。【原文：Apple Inc. enjoyed a sharp rebound in China during the holiday period, when demand for the new iPhone 17 fueled its first $25 billion quarter in the region since the end of 2021.】

item.title: 美国官员称将在与盟友会谈期间寻求建立稀土定价机制
item.description: 美国政府一名高级官员表示，下周在华盛顿举行的多国外长会议期间，美国将寻求与盟国就定价机制达成共识，以帮助稀土矿物精炼商和开采商规避风险。【原文：The US will seek to reach consensus with allies on a pricing mechanism to help insulate rare earth mineral refiners and extractors during meetings with dozens of foreign ministers in Washington next week, a senior Trump administration official said.】

item.title: 莫迪将押注经济增长：全球风险下的预算要点解析
item.description: 据彭博新闻社对经济学家的调查显示，印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪的预算案很可能侧重于为每年加入劳动力大军的数百万印度人创造就业机会，同时保护经济免受全球不确定性和关税紧张局势的影响。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s budget is likely to focus on measures to create jobs for millions of Indians joining the workforce each year, while shielding the economy from global uncertainties and tariff tensions, according to a survey of economists by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 人民币有望将十年连涨势头延续至农历新年
item.description: 人民币汇率延续逾十年最长的周度涨势，随着出口商在农历新年来临前增加对人民币的需求，预计人民币将进一步走强。【原文：The Chinese yuan, riding its longest weekly rally in more than a decade, is expected to strengthen further as exporters boost demand for the currency ahead of the Lunar New Year.】
